Translations.Text: Allah, the Independent and Besought of all
He did not beget, and He has not been begotten
and did not become unto Him, equal in status — any one.”
Declare: “I seek refuge with Rabb of the day-break
against the evil-effect of that which He has created
and against the evil-effect of darkness when it has fully set
and against the evil-effect of those personalities who try to create sabotage in a commitment
and against the evil-effect of an envious when he envied.”
Declare: “I seek refuge with Rabb (Nourisher-Sustainer) of mankind
— against the evil-effect of one who whispers (but) hides himself
that who whispers in the chests of mankind
